To calculate the mean arterial pressure (MAP), we use the formula for mean arterial pressure:

\[ \text{MAP} = \frac{\text{(2 \times diastolic blood pressure) + systolic blood pressure}}{3} \]

- Supine: systolic = 89 mm Hg, diastolic = 52 mm Hg
- Standing: systolic = 69 mm Hg, diastolic = 40 mm Hg
